column5: I wish that it was possible to make the cold weather up North go away but since I can't try this  Blowing soap bubbles http://distractify.com/culture/arts/frozen-bubbles-in-wintertime/   Art
Cool, I got a Bubble Gun for Christmas.  When it gets cold again I'll try it and post the pics Art!
I wish that it was possible to make the cold weather up North go away Art  Whaat?? We need more to make it safe for ice fishing.
Well I tried today Art, but it is too windy.  All my bubbles just mostly blew away.  I'll try later if the wind calms down.  They did freeze though!!
